casebody.data:
176 A.3d 220 LISA HUNT, AS GUARDIAN AD LITEM OF HAILEY ROSINA HUNT, A MINOR, AND LISA AND RUSSELL HUNT, AS PARENTS AND NATURAL GUARDIANS OF HAILEY ROSINA HUNT, AND LISA AND RUSSELL HUNT, INDIVIDUALLY, PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. VIRTUA HEALTH, INC., VIRTUA WEST JERSEY HOSPITAL VOORHEES, LINDA FARAGASSO, R.N.C., CHRISTINE PEASE, R.N., AND BARBARA JONES, R.N., DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS, AND WOMEN’S GROUP FOR OB/GYN, PAMELA KOPELOVE, M.D., JEAN TORRANCE, R.N.C., NOREEN PALMAY, R.N., AND DR. LYNCH, DEFENDANTS.

C-358 September Term 2017

079863 December 1, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004196-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
